returns.positionId: The ID of the created position

returns.amount: Total PT amount for this maturity

params.daysAhead: Number of days to look ahead

params.positionId: Position ID to mark as redeemed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateRedeemableAmount().notice: Calculate amount that can be redeemed

getPositionsByMaturity(uint256).notice: Get all positions for a specific maturity

getTotalLockedValue().notice: Calculate total value locked in PT tokens

getTotalPTForMaturity(uint256).notice: Get total PT amount for a specific maturity

getUpcomingMaturities(uint256).notice: Get upcoming maturities within next N days
